DOC.brief_summary: Several factor associate neck pain . Controversy exist regard degree association factor neck pain . Information regard degree association factor neck pain need effective prevention appropriate treatment strategy . The aim study investigate association among musculoskeletal , sensorimotor factor functional disability occurrence chronic nonspecific neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Musculoskeletal , Sensorimotor Functional Factors Nonspecific Chronic Neck Pain
